Interface ControllerToolCardActionsInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    App, CLIApp, JavaFXApp

    public interface ControllerToolCardActionsInterface
    Interface for Controller-View communication (this interface is for the Tool Card use)
    Author:
    Mathyas Giudici
